summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the HunyuanDiT pipeline, covering component retrieval, feed‑forward chunking, fused QKV projection handling, inference correctness (including batch and identical inputs), checkpoint saving/loading with optional components, and CPU offloading behavior during sequential forward passes.
business_intent: Validate the reliability, performance, and correctness of the HunyuanDiT diffusion pipeline in production environments by detecting regressions and confirming that optimizations and resource‑management strategies function as intended.
